TopicTitle: Old Horizons - a KSP representation of New Horizons - The New Kerizons Challenge

Articles.Content:
So, New Horizons is due to arrive in 3 days, woohoo!

To comemorate that moment, i created this: ***Old Horizons*** - a probe set to discover the origins of the Kerbol System.

Sit back, take some snacks and enjoy the pic heavy album of the complete mission.You can go [here](http://imgur.com/a/K1a54#0) to see this album in larger resolution.

Enjoy!

**Total mission time: 9y and 133d**

From launch to the end of the mission.

NOTE: My probe uses one RTG instead of New Horizons, which uses two.

![dNL3lLm.png](http://i.imgur.com/dNL3lLm.png)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/K1a54)

**Mods used:**

- Transfer Window Planner

- Kerbal Alarm Clock

- Asteroid Day

New Kerizons Challenge belongs to Souper: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128386-New-Kerizons-Race-to-Eeloo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128386-New-Kerizons-Race-to-Eeloo)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-12T10:02:01Z" title="07/12/2015 10:02  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 12, 2015</time> by Candlelight**
Nice job. I hope the real probe goes on to find something else interesting in the Outer Darkness.
